text: Twilight is Future of Forestry's debut album released on Credential Recordings. It was released on January 23, 2007. ==Track listing== # "Open Wide" – 3:55 # "All I Want" – 4:13 # "Twilight" – 4:55 # "Speak to Me Gently" – 4:09 # "Thinking of You" – 4:27 # "Sunrising" – 4:30 # "Sacred Place" – 3:43 # "You and I" – 4:44 # "Sanctitatis" – 4:30 # "If You Find Her" – 3:25 # "Gazing" – 4:13 # "Stay Beside Me/Hidden Track" – 14:01 ==Awards== In 2008, the album was nominated for a Dove Award for Rock Album of the Year at the 39th GMA Dove Awards. ==References== Category:Credential Recordings albums Category:2007 albums
title: Twilight (Future of Forestry album)
